name: Atmos Archery
description:
Summery
-------------------------

Face rounds of UFO attacks as a sole archer to defend earth with just your skill with the bow and arrow! Upgrading your skills along the way as you face larger and larger waves. However, your skills will only improve through high accuracy and hit streaks!

This AR experience is available for Windows and Android below.

Controls
-------------------------

Camera Move - Mouse

ActionPCAndroidCamera Movement
Mouse movementGyro Controls
ShootingLeft Mouse Click
Button in
Bottom Right
PauseEscapeButton in
Top Right
Reset Gyro Position
N/AButton in
Bottom Left
